oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - The Sounds Of Bakersfield - 2012-03-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances honoring the music of Bakersfield California by Red Simpson, Gene Breeden, Dallas Frazier, Don Maddox, Rose Lee Maphis, Eugene Moles Jr., Buddy Mize, Dennis Payne, Deke Dickerson and others. From the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 24, 2012
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Simpson; Gene Breeden; Dallas Frazier; Don Maddox; Rose Lee Maphis; Eugene Moles Jr.; Buddy Mize; Dennis Payne; Deke Dickerson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include; The Streets Of Bakersfield (Deke Dickerson); California On My Mind (Deke Dickerson); Flash, Crash And Thunder (Gene Breeden); Buckaroo (Jack Sanders, Kenny Vaughn and Eugene Moles Jr.); The Shoe Goes On the Other Foot Tonight (Buddy Mize); Cinderella (Buddy Mize); Dim Lights, Thick Smoke (and Loud, Loud Music) (Rose Lee Maphis); The Kind Of Love I Can't Forget (Rose Lee Maphis); Paul Bunyon Love (Don Maddox); The Death Of Rock And Roll (Don Maddox); Fourteen Caret Mind (Dallas Frazier); (I'm So Afraid) Of Losing You Again (Dallas Frazier); Under Your Spell Again (Dennis Payne); Playboy (Dennis Payne); Hello, I'm A Truck (Red Simpson); Truck Driving Man (Red Simpson); Truck Driver's Blues (Red Simpson); Heartbreak Hotel (Red Simpson); Lucky Old Colorado (Red Simpson); Sam's Place (Red Simpson); Close Up The Honky Tonks (Red Simpson); You Don't Have Very Far To Go (Red Simpson); Diesel Smoke and Dangerous Curves (Red Simpson); Roll, Truck, Roll (Red Simpson); Big Mack (Red Simpson); Bakersfield (Red Simpson); Highway Patrol (Red Simpson); The Nitro Express (Red Simpson); Hammin' It Up (band); The Honky Tonk Night Time Man (Deke Dickerson and all performers);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Frazier, Dallas, 1939-; Dickerson, Deke; Breeden, Gene; Maddox, Don; Maphis, Rose Lee; Moles Jr., Eugene; Mize, Buddy; Payne, Dennis; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
